REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0711 reute h f BC-REXCOM-<RXSC>-EXTENDS 03-12 0037

TEXT.TITLE: REXCOM <RXSC> EXTENDS WARRANT EXERCISE PERIOD
TEXT.BODY: Rexcom Systems Corp said its board voted to extend the exercise period for the company's publicly traded warrants until March 31, 1988 from March 31, 1987. Reuter
